mapper.select: SELECT /* PaymentMapper.selectByPaymentId */ PAYMENT_ID , MEMBER_ID , ORDER_ID , CLAIM_ID , AMOUNT , PAYMENT_METHOD , PAY_TYPE , PG_COMPANY , STATUS , ORDER_STATUS , TRANSACTION_ID , PAYMENT_DATE FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYMENT_ID = #{paymentId}

SELECT /* PaymentMapper.selectByOrderId */ PAYMENT_ID , MEMBER_ID , ORDER_ID , CLAIM_ID , AMOUNT , PAYMENT_METHOD , PAY_TYPE , PG_COMPANY , STATUS , ORDER_STATUS , TRANSACTION_ID , PAYMENT_DATE FROM PAYMENT WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId} ORDER BY PAYMENT_DATE

SELECT /* PaymentMapper.selectAll */ PAYMENT_ID , MEMBER_ID , ORDER_ID , CLAIM_ID , AMOUNT , PAYMENT_METHOD , PAY_TYPE , PG_COMPANY , STATUS , ORDER_STATUS , TRANSACTION_ID , PAYMENT_DATE FROM PAYMENT ORDER BY PAYMENT_DATE DESC
